p.d: On-stage at the Opéra Bastille in Paris, with the help of three choreographers, Bintou Dembélé, Igor Caruge and Brahim Rachiki, and a group of krump dancers, Clément Cogitore adapts a short extract from the ballet "Les Indes Galantes" (The Amorous Indies), by Jean-Philippe Rameau. Directed by: Clément Cogitore (France, 2017) Genre: documentary Awards: official selection (César 2019)
